meta.title: Independence Day 2025 | College Events
meta.description: Join us to celebrate the spirit of freedom with a grand parade and cultural events on August 15, 2025.

about.title: About The Celebration
description: Join the entire college community as we come together to celebrate the 78th Independence Day of India. This day is a tribute to our freedom fighters and the rich history of our nation.

The event will feature a grand parade by the NCC and NSS units, followed by inspiring speeches and a series of patriotic cultural performances by our talented students. It is a day to reflect on our journey and renew our commitment to the nation's progress.

highlights.title: Last Year's Parade
highlights.caption: A look back at the proud moments from the 2024 parade.

categories.title: Patriotic Parade
categories.description: Witness the disciplined march of our student units.

categories.title: Cultural Shows
categories.description: Enjoy songs and dances celebrating our heritage.

categories.title: Inspiring Speeches
categories.description: Listen to our esteemed guests and student leaders.

categories.title: Community Gathering
categories.description: A day for all students and faculty to unite.

guests.name: Hon. District Magistrate
guests.bio: An esteemed public servant dedicated to the community.

articles.title: Independence Day Program Announced
articles.excerpt: Join us to celebrate the spirit of freedom with a grand parade and cultural events.

team.title: Organizing Committee
team.joinText: Be a part of the celebration! Contact the Student Affairs office to volunteer.

questions.question: Is the event open to all?
questions.answer: Yes, all students, faculty, and local citizens are welcome to attend.
